subject: Shipping
description_text: Has my product shipped out yet?  I ordered from aliexpress

conversations.body_text: Hi Corey Mason,    You can inquire with the seller on the aliexpress store.

It is your guy's store.. is your official store. And I'm getting no response no matter how many times I message


________________________________
Hi Corey Mason,  Could you please provide a screenshot of your order number and the store name? I’ll check which store’s customer service responded.

I was excited to get this but now I'm extremely disappointed because here we are almost 5 days later and it hasn't even been sent but yet I'm being told it has been.


________________________________

Please I just want to know what's going on I feel like I'm going through too much to get an answer on this


________________________________

Hi Corey Mason,  I have contacted the AliExpress operations team. Due to a temporary shortage of some parts, the shipment might be slightly delayed, but it should be dispatched very soon. You don’t need to worry.
